name: Gravity Maze (edu060)
description:
Developers: Eduardo Zwetsch, Hugo Basso, Rodrigo Zwetsch, Vitoria Ramos

Description: This is a physics-based game where th player controls a maze using an arduino and gyroscope.

Gameplay video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AgdwyKizZe0


Exit with: Alt+F4, obviously
